name: 吳和庭
objective: 本課程介紹通訊網路的各種架構及重要通信協定，內容包括：１. 電腦網路概述與網路階層結構２. 應用層架構及協定 ３. 傳輸層架構及協定 ４. 網路層架構及協定 ５. 鏈路層及區域網路技術與應用６. 無線及行動網路架構７. 多媒體網路架構
schedule:
有關本課程教材、作業及相關公告事項，請隨時查詢本課程北科 i 學園 PLUS 的網頁。

Week 1: Introduction; Internet Architecture
Week 2: Protocol Layer and Their Service Models
Week 3: Data communication principles
Week 4;: Application Layer: Principles; Web and HTTP; E-mail System
Week 5;: Application Layer: DNS; P2P Application
Week 6: Transport Layer: Principles; Connectionless Transport; UDP protocol
Week 7: Transport Layer: Reliable Transport; TCP protocol; Congestion Control
Week 8: The Network Layer-Data Plane: Principles; Router Architecture
Week 9: Midterm; The Network Layer-Data Plane: IP; Routing Algorithms
Week 10: The Network Layer-Control Plane:
Week 11: Link Layer: Principles; Media Access Control Protocols
Week 12: Local Area Networks: Ethernet; Link-Layer Switching
Week 13: Wireless Links and Network Characteristics
Week 14: WiFi: IEEE 802.11 wireless LANs and Beyond
Week 15: Principles of Cellular Networks
Week 16: Mobility Management; Mobile IP
Week 17: Selected Topics on Computer Networks
Week 18: Final Exam.
